verses.name: Hebrews 11:23
verses.text: By faith Moses, when he was born, was hid three months of his parents, because they saw he was a proper child; and they were not afraid of the king’s commandment.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:24
verses.text: By faith Moses, when he was come to years, refused to be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter;

verses.name: Hebrews 11:25
verses.text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God, than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season;

verses.name: Hebrews 11:26
verses.text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt: for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward.
